description: A simple warm roasted beetroot salad with a smoky and sweet flavour.
name: Sweet & Smoky Roasted Beetroot Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the beetroot from the oven and allow to cool, then toss with the salad leave and drizzle with dressing before serving.
